price: As for those who reject Our signs, they are the people of the Left[5],
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
footnotes: [5] i.e., those who receive the records of their deeds in the left hand and proceed to Hellfire.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
